title: Shame  / Not Wanted 1949 (Film-Noir, Drama) Elmer Clifton, Ida Lupino | Colorized

sources.title: Shame  / Not Wanted 1949 (Film-Noir, Drama) Elmer Clifton, Ida Lupino | Colorized
sources.description:
Out of Innocent Confusion . . . was born HEARTBREAK! . . . In a picture that plunges heart-deep into the story of one girl's mistake! 
A beautiful but unsophisticated girl is seduced by a worldly piano player and gives up her out-of-wedlock baby, her guilt compels her to kidnap another child.


Original title: Not Wanted (1949) AKA: Shame / Unwed Mother / Streets of Sin 
This movie is available with subtitles in many languages. 

Watch the HD Black & White version: https://youtu.be/Je11gPeMJM8


Director: Elmer Clifton, Ida Lupino 
Writer: Paul Jarrico, Ida Lupino, Malvin Wald 
Stars: Sally Forrest, Keefe Brasselle, Leo Penn
Genre: Colorized, Drama, Triple F rated
Budget: $153,000



00;00 Full colorized Film (with subtitles)
02:47 A glimpse into a dramatic film featuring a young woman's struggles and family dynamics in the 1940s.
14:20 Young woman's struggles with family, aspirations, and encounters with a stranger named Drew Baxter.
25:57 A chance encounter leads to a job offer and a surprise visit, highlighting the complexities of relationships and responsibilities.
33:41 Classic film-noir featuring a woman's journey through unexpected circumstances and a budding romance in the 1940s.
43:33 A woman expresses her feelings for a man who is leaving town, but he rejects her and explains his need to keep moving.
53:29 A woman receives unexpected news and faces a difficult decision regarding her pregnancy.
58:39 A young woman seeks help at a home for unwed mothers, hiding her pregnancy from her family and the father of the baby.
1:06:49 A young woman struggles with the decision to give up her baby for adoption.
1:21:34 A young woman faces the consequences of her actions after mistakenly believing a baby is hers.
